prompt:
SELECT id, title, concat('https://idyoveanwiuwcvgxijtz.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/eagle-images/', storage_path) as imageUrl
FROM eagle_images,
LATERAL (
    SELECT 
        0.8 * ts_rank_cd(tsv, q) + 
        0.6 * similarity(unaccent(coalesce(title,'')), unaccent('RAINFOREST')) + 
        0.5 * coalesce((SELECT max(similarity(unaccent(tag), unaccent('RAINFOREST'))) FROM unnest(tags) as tag), 0.0) as score
    WHERE 
        tsv = to_tsvector('simple', unaccent(coalesce(title,'') || ' ' || array_to_string(tags,' '))),
        q = plainto_tsquery('simple', unaccent('RAINFOREST')),
        ((tsv @@ q) OR 
         similarity(unaccent(coalesce(title,'')), unaccent('RAINFOREST')) > 0.12 OR 
         coalesce((SELECT max(similarity(unaccent(tag), unaccent('RAINFOREST'))) FROM unnest(tags) as tag), 0.0) > 0.12)
) scored
ORDER BY (score + 0.03*random()) DESC, created_at DESC
LIMIT 3
